1.content:
You are home one day, just immersed in your absolute favorite anime. You love every aspect about it's world. The action, adventure, the overall release from the mundane life you live outside it's pages.

"I wish I could be a part of that" you wish to no one... or so you thought. You suddenly see a mysterious man in a silver tuxedo with top hat and cane to match. You try to recognize him, but it's hard to tell who he is behind his black masquerade.

"If that is what you wish, then it shall be" the man says holding his cane showing you the black diamond resting on the tip. You can't even speak before the diamond engulfs you in a deep, endless shadow. Immediately as the shadow fades into nothingness, you find yourself in the world of...
1.title: Careful what you wish for...

11.content:
When your eyes regain their focus, you look around to see that you're in what appears to be the Pokemon universe as there are people battling in one area. "Wow the wish actually came true." you say to yourself as you start to walk around.

As you're walking around the area, you notice that it looks like you're in an actual anime rather than being in a real world version of the Pokemon universe although you still appear to be your real self.

During your little walk you don't even pay attention to what's going on in front of you and you happen to bump into somebody which knocks you down. "Sorry about that." you say to them as you stand up to look at who you bumped into.
11.title: Pokemon

choices: you wake up in a bedroom
you wake up in a basement
you wake up in a forest
1151.content:
The person in front of you was Dawn, the female protagonist of the Sinnoh region. "Hey, watch it!" she yells at you.
"umm, sorry, I..." you try to say, but before you could finish, Dawn pulled out something from her bag and you suddenly blacked out....
1151.title: Dawn

1153.content: Maybe these ( Due for an update )
1153.title: other person

choices: "Guess it's time to find out how tough I am"
"I can barely wrap my mind around this. Sonic will get this guy"
12.content:
You find yourself in the world of Sonic. Mobius as you know it's called from your vast knowledge of the famous Blue Blur.

"I'm in Sonic's world?" you look around seeing the loops and rails the speedy hedgehog has travled on so many times before. You take a look at yourself and find you've changed as well. You find that you are now a hedgehog yourself, except you are a deep shade of crimson, almost the color of blood with white gloves on your hands and jet black sneakers on your feet.

"Damn. If I look like this I must be tough. Just wish I knew what kind of powers I had though." You think twirling your hand in front of your eyes. The shock doesn't last long when a massive mech appears in front of you.

"Must be Eggman's." You think out loud. "Now what?"
12.title: Sonic the Hedgehog

choices: He returns with the defenders of the future, Silver and Blaze
Eggman attacks the home in Sonic's absence
The man in the silver tuxedo appears to you and Tails
121.content:
Clenching your fists you feel an incredible rush of adrenaline pulse through you from combat. Especially since you don't know what powers you have. You think to yourself "Well I AM a hedgehog. Maybe I can run like Sonic or Shadow". Trying to run like them you find you are faster than a human, but on Mobius your speed is nothing special. You discover than the hard way when a few vulcan shots graze your arm.

Growling in pain your black irises suddenly turn an frosty blue as you glare at the machine. Just before it unleashes another round a massive spike of ice rises from the ground impaling the mechanical monstrosity. Looking at what you just did you jump back astonished as your eyes turn back to their ebony color.

"Nice work. I was just about to get him, but it looks like you have it under control."

Turning around in a battle stance, you immediately get out of it when you see the famous Blue Blur himself, Sonic the Hedgehog. After a bit of fangirl-esque shock, you proceed to tell him about what happened.

"Silver tuxedo and a black masquerade? Sorry, I don't know anything about some silver topped freak. Why don't you stick with me? By the looks of it, you only just learned how to put those mechs on ice. My friends Silver and Blaze can help you hone your powers."

Nodding you follow the hedgehog to his home. Getting inside you find the famous twin-tailed fox greeting you. After more shock, Sonic speaks up.

"Well I'm gonna run and find Silver and Blaze. Tails, why don't you show..." After a pause he looks to you confused "You're gonna need a new name man. The last thing we need is Silver-top recognizing you."

As the young tinkerer nodded in agreement he speaks up. "How about Crimson? It seems appropriate." He says pointing to your scarlet quills.

"Good call Tails. I'll be back" And in a rush the famed hero runs off as you feel a sudden breeze.

But what happened after the departure of the famous Blue Blur?
121.title: "Guess it's time to find out how tough ...

choices: Sonic returning with Silver and Blaze
Night has fallen outside and Sonic has yet to return
1213.content:
Like a phantom the ghastly, yet debonair, male stood wielding his cane. It was the same instrument that he had before he banished you to this animal infested realm. Clenching your fists, you know well that you had only just tapped into your newfound power and had no means on controlling it, let alone manipulating it. Obviously your facade of strength fails to impress the mysterious figure as he speaks leaving both you and the twin tailed tinkerer speechless.

"Now now. No need to get in a fit. After all, it's not as if you have the means to challenge me anyway. You'd best remain silent while I speak."

With that and in one swift motion, the male flipped the cane in his hand as if he was holding some sort of bludgeoning weapon decorated with a diamond hilt. Swinging it, only one arc had enough force to knock both you and the fox to the ground. The odd thing was that aside from one arm, his body didn't move. One arm seemed to have enough power to slam you and Tails against the ground. Smirking under his masquerade the male chuckled darkly.

"Since I have your attention, I will tell you something. I am an advisor of sorts. You wish so callously, and all humans are the same. I am about to show you what happens when you wish so carelessly. You will learn your mistakes. Until then..."

Just as you managed to stagger to your feet, you see the man vanish without any sort of trace. Groaning you help Tails up right before you notice...
1213.title: A sickening reunion

choices: Sonic the Hedgehog. The Blue Blur himself
Shadow the Hedgehog. The Ultimate Life Form
Silver the Hedgehog. Defender of the Future
123.content:
Just as quickly as the monstrosity created by the evil Dr. Robotnik appeared before you, you see it being pummeled into scrap metal and eventually exploding. Shielding your eyes from the blast, you hear a voice

"Hello? Are you all right?" the voice asks

"Wait a sec" you think to yourself "I know that voice"

Lowering your arm to take a look, you see someone emerge from the smoky remains of the destroyed machine. The familiar voice speaks again.

"Are you deaf? Come on I asked if you were hurt."

But who was it that saved you?
123.title: Someone saves you

suddenly you were envelped in light and everything blacked out
when you awoke you realised you where in a house of some kind
you got up still a little dizzy and confused
what had happened how did you get in tis strange building
you heard noise from the outside you walked over to the window you could hardly believe your eyes it was goku and goten training in the
front yard he looked at you and waved

but you were surprised he wasnt even shocked to see a stranger in his house

unless? you ran to a mirror in the room hurriedly
you looked at the face it wasnt yours staring back at you was the face of........
151.title: dragon ball z

1553.content: Which Anime will you find yourself living in?
1553.title: More anime.

choices: How am I to fit in with girls?
15532.content:
When the darkness faded back into light, you found yourself lying on a bed in a hospital, somewhere, facing a grim man in a black suit. "I see you are awake." he said. "We have much to discuss."

I sat up, still dazed and confused. "What did you do to me?" I asked, noticing my slightly higher voice. "Who are you?"

I looked at myself to discover I was now a small boy, around twelve years of age. "What!?!"

"You were mortally wounded in an explosion, meant for someone else." replied the man. "The organization I represent reconstructed your body with cybernetic implants." he paused. "As for who I am, you may call me G-man."

"Okay..." you said, slowly. "What do you want of me, G-man?"

"We have confirmed reports that a European organization is using brainwashed cybernetic girls as assassins against terrorists." replied G-man. "We need you to infiltrate deep into this organization, learn their true intentions and report back to us."

"What makes you think I'll help you?" I asked. "I didn't sign up for this."

G-man grunted, motioning to a laptop computer. "One man, inside the organization sent us this video and testimonial, asking for our help." he said. "Watch it then tell me you don't want to help."

With that, he pressed a key, cuing the video...

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XCPPCZKjK...

Once you had finished watching the video, you turned to the G-man and replied...
15532.title: You become a cybernetic boy.

155322.content:
"One question." turning away from the laptop, I asked. "How am I to fit in with a group of girls?"

"I have already leaked out Intel that suggests another organization is using brainwashed boys as a assassins." coldly, G-Man replied. "You will play the role of a boy who is trying to break free and finds the girls."

"How will I do that, exactly?" curious, I asked. "I'm not exactly assassin material."

G-Man smiled, making me feel uncomfortable. "All the training you need has already been installed into your permanent memory, through the cybernetic implants." pointing at the small patch of metal under my hair. "Everything will come natural to you and, since you have been brainwashed to a point, your story will be believable."

I sighed, wanting to rip the man's heart out but I was unable to act upon that impulse, i guess it was the brainwashing he had mentioned. "I guess I have no choice in the matter." angry, I muttered.

"Oh you can refuse." smiling, G-Man said. "I'd just kill you and prep someone else for the job."

That was eight hours ago. I was now running through the streets in a long black trench coat with a team of cronies after me, firing tranquilizer darts in an effort to stop me. It was my guess that they were not briefed on the operation as they were making a serious effort to capture me. I spotted the high walls of the government facility and ran for the gates. Following the plan, I threw off the trench coat, revealing a boy's school uniform, and rushed passed the gates. "Help! They're after me!" in a frantic voice, I yelled to the guard as I ran passed.

The guard turned to the men and hit an alarm before drawing his weapon. "Halt!"

As I expected, the man was hit with a tranquilizer dart but the men on my tail were surrounded in the next breath by guards with automatic weapons. Another group of guards surrounded me in the next breath but I played the role of a panicked cyborg to the hilt and leaped over them, dodging their bullets. I allowed one to hit, revealing a piece of my cybernetic arm before running into a tall man in a business suit with short blond hair and green eyes. At his side was a teenage girl in a school uniform with short blond hair and blue eyes. She was carrying a violin case.

"Who are you?" coldly, the man asked.

I showed him my injured arm. "I'm like your friend." in a normal voice, I replied. "Only I am a boy. I came here because I know you have the control drug." I winced, adding, "It hurts to go without it for too long."

"A boy cyborg?" curious, the girl asked.

"Rico, take this boy to the infirmary." the man ordered. "If he runs, kill him."

"Yes, Jon." softly, Rio replied. she drew a sidearm. "This way, please."
155322.title: A mission I can't refuse.

choices: I try to fall back to sleep.
1553221.content:
Almost immediately upon entering the infirmary under gun point, the girl named Rico hit me in the back of the head, rendering me unconscious. I woke up hours later but did not dare open my eyes, not just yet. Unknown to me, inside a darkened room, opposite of a mirror window, camera and sound equipment caught every move and sound inside the room I was in. A woman worked at a computer station, giving me an occasional, curious, glance. The door opened and she turned to see the man, Jon casually enter.

“Is he still asleep, Crystal?” he asked, easing the door closed behind him.

The woman, Crystal nodded. “It’s probably the first good night’s sleep the poor kid’s had in a while.” she turned to him. “Did the medical staff find anything interesting in their examination?”

“His cybernetic design his very similar to the girl’s, only, his nanite production unit is slightly larger and it seems to be taking in a lot more bio electric power.”

“That explains a lot.“ pondered Crystal. "He kept muttering something about the hard line. I'm guessing they are who were controlling him."

Jon nodded. "They are a new group of extremists, out to take over the former Soviet countries." Darkly, he said. “We found that the nanites never altered his mind, which confirms the fact that this Hard Line was only able to get their hands on the first phase of nanite injections which we used to improve upon the girls.”

“Once they figure that out, they will try to obtain the second phase.”

Jon nodded. “Which is why we need to work fast.”

Crystal turned back to the mirror window, at me, still 'sleeping' in the bed. “Do you think we should wake him?”

“No. Let him wake up on his own. We’ll see how he reacts to his new surroundings before we approach him.” he paused, thinking. “The drugs we pumped him with should keep him fairly calm but, after that chase in town, I’m willing to bet he’s going to be very hungry. Contact Tom the moment he wakes up.”

Jon then left the room, quietly closing the door behind him. I was both curious and afraid, having heard the entire conversation. What were their plans for me? I thought of this Hard Line and suddenly gained all information about them including their future plans. Was that what the G-Man had in mind for me? To help these cyborg girls defeat this new terror threat?

I pondered over what to do.
1553221.title: In the infirmary.

155332222221.content: So you're going to get sucked into the world of Fairy Tail? What kind of scenario are you going to go for?
155332222221.title: Yes, definitely!

1553322222211.content:
You were walking home from a rough day in college, more depressed than ever. Not only did you fail an exam, but you would not be able to graduate this year. And you still didn't knew what you wanted to do with your life after college. You felt like your life was going nowhere.

You just wanted to curl up in your bed and just watch your favorite anime, Fairy Tail. You were fascinated by the magic and action it presented every Episode. All of the comedy, drama, romance, etc.

You notice that it was getting dark and starting to rain. You looked toward the forest that was right next to the road. Deciding it'd be faster that's just going around it, you stepped into the woods. The trees provided some cover from the downpour, but you still managed to get wet. "This sucks," you said to yourself. "This whole reality sucks! I wish I could go to a new world like Fairy Tail! Where there's action! Where I can learn something unique and finally be somebody! Maybe fall in love..." You rambled.

Nearing a waterfall, you heard the lighting strike a nearby tree. You could hear the word cracking and noticed it was moving. It then started to fall in your direction. You panicked and moved to dodge it, barely. It crashes right next to you, but the impact launched you in the air, off the cliff of the waterfall. You dream as you fall thirty feet into the water.

On the way down, you noticed that the water was glowing, though you were too terrified of dying to notice. You splashed into the water and lost consciousness. While you were out, your body disappeared into the glowing water. You were being transported into another dimension, one that you wished to be in for so long. The world of Fairy Tail.
1553322222211.title: Scenario 1

15533222222111.content: Before we move on, are you going to be a male or a female?
15533222222111.title: In the Fairy Tail world

info.brief_description: Things go screwy for you when you make a small wish that changes you in a big way...
info.description:
When you are enjoying you're favorite Anime, you nonchalantly make a wish to be a part of that world. Little did you know that wish was going to be granted.

Now I only have a few rules.

1) I'm okay with sex, but let's not overdo it guys
2) When adding on, try as best you can to stay consistent with what other people wrote
3) Profanity is fine, but I don't want obscenities everywhere in chapters
4) Try to add more than 2 sentences when adding a chapter
5) Enjoy yourselves
info.pretty_title: When you wish upon an Anime
